name: NEOCRAFT Vulkan Edition
description:
This is game uses unity  c# and by default the Vulkan API to create a

better gaming experience  compared to mine-craft, it is free of a stupid  in game store.

It is planed to support modding  and by default use 64x64 textures, that is 4096 pixels per block instead of only 256 , due to better code and better API it should run smoother and give better FPS.

The story of the game is completely different from mine-crafts story and will be hints throughout the game of what happened.
